Binary.Name: msvcp140.dll
Binary.Reason: Added by VS to console apps not a OneCore Violation.

Binary.Name: vcruntime140.dll
Binary.Reason: Added by VS to console apps not a OneCore Violation.

Binary.Name: iumsdk.dll
Binary.Reason: Update binary allow list used by APIValidator to include iumsdk.dll.

Binary.Name: mscoree.dll
Binary.Reason: Update binary allow list used by APIValidator to include mscoree.dll.

Binary.Name: concrt140.dll
Binary.Reason: Will be redistributed with the driver when msvcp140.dll is used. Drivers themselves won't depend on this, but msvcp140.dll does so it needs to be excluded as well so APIValidator validates appropriately.
